descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: This is the first quarter of the Beginning German sequence: a systematic introduction to basic German. All four language skills - speaking, listening comprehension, reading and writing - are stressed to insure that students acquire a basic command of German. Classes are conducted in German, except when explanations of grammar or other material require the use of English. Key feature of this quarter: Individual oral interviews at the end of the quarter.

descriptions.name: Teaching Method
descriptions.value: Lecture, discussion, homework, listening exercises, presentations

descriptions.name: Evaluation Method
descriptions.value: Attendance, class participation, quizzes, oral interview
